data.name: Shadow Life Demo
data.detailed_description:
Put on your adventurer's hat, and hang your trusty knife at your side. Explore 80 temples and caves, slay monsters, and avoid traps and hazards. Defeat giant scorpions, beetles, mummies, ghosts, and more! Battle your way past five bosses. Destroy the Book of Dark Magic to defeat the evil spirit that inhabits these lands.

Demo Features:
- 8 levels
- Male and female playable characters
- Traps and hazards
- Monsters to slay
- Replay previous levels
- Play with controller or keyboard

Full Game Features:
- 80 levels
- Male and female playable characters
- 5 boss battles
- Discover hidden rooms
- Traps and hazards
- Monsters to slay
- Replay previous levels
- Play with controller or keyboard

data.short_description: Explore temples and caves. Slay monsters and avoid traps and hazards. Uncover hidden rooms. Repair the Book of Dark Magic to defeat the evil spirit that inhabits this world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB graphics card
  • Storage: 736 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Play with controller or keyboard, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+ (64-bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB graphics card
  • Storage: 736 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Play with controller or keyboard, 16:9 recommended
